name: Kurupir
description:
A B O U T

Kurupir is a puzzle/rhythm game where you have a mission to restore the forest, but be careful, a crow will try and prevent you form planting trees.  Reach the exit sign to go to the next level and keep up the good work!

C O N T R O L S

Move ::  ARROW KEYS

Throw Seed Bomb :: LEFT MOUSE CLICK

Restart :: ENTER

Options :: ESC

C R E D I T S

Art :: Nielisson | https://nielisson.com

Sounds :: Mighty Muso | Website  | Soundcloud | Twitter

Programming :: Sebastian | https://potassium3919.itch.io/

D I S C L A I M E R S

The game still has some bugs, but we are working on it, so we can fix these issues and provide more fun levels. =)
